Speaker: Customer
Text: Good evening and welcome to smith and martin law business, I'm Joyce and how might I help you?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Hello? Wow, I'm glad your office is still open

Speaker: Customer
Text: I'd like to set up a appointment with Mr. Smith to discuss about legal separation issues.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yes, ma'am you can call us 24-7 and yes. I can help you set up an meeting with Councillor Smith.

Speaker: Customer
Text: When is your preferred date and time?

Speaker: Customer
Text: As soon as possible time.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I see. Before anything else, may I have a name please so I can address you properly?

Speaker: Customer
Text: As well as state it for  the appointment log.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Oh Mary Craig

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank-you Ms Craig, Let's see.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Councillor Smith's earliest availability is on Friday at 8am.

Speaker: Customer
Text: What? That long? And that early?

Speaker: Customer
Text: It's only Monday and I can't stand one more day.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I'm sorry to hear that, ma'am. Unfortunately, that's the only time that's free.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I'll double check to see if there's another fee slot sooner than that.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I believe there's one here, my apologies, as I didn't see it.

Speaker: Customer
Text: It's at Thursday at 5pm.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Oh well, that'll have to do than.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Very well, man. So I'll book you for a meeting with Councillor Smith and Thursday at 5pm.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Alrighty then. Do you need directions on how to get here?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Nah, I've been there before. The counselor knows me very well.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Very good, ma'am. I hope everything goes well.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you. Would there be anything else I can help you with?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Nah, that's fine. So long as we get settled. Very well ma'am.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you for calling Smith law offices have a nice day today.

Speaker: Customer
Text: You too
